name: Friendly Cashier
description: A Sheetz employee whose nametag keeps changing to different impossible names.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome to infinite convenience! What impossible flavor would you like today?

about_food.initial: Every MTO is made with a dash of impossibility!
about_food.menu: The menu changes based on your deepest cravings...
about_food.special: Today's special? Time-twisted tacos that are always fresh!
